item.sql: select t.*, t1.name PayStatusLabel, t2.name OrderStatusLabel, t3.name RefundStatus, t4.name PayTypeName, t5.name CardTypeName, t6.name FlowTypeName, t8.name PayNotifyState, t9.name OrderNotifyState, t10.CHANNEL_NAME DownChannelName from order_main t left join sys_dictionary t1 on t1.value = t.pay_status and t1.type = 'PayStatus' left join sys_dictionary t2 on t2.value = t.order_status and t2.type = 'OrderStatus' left join sys_dictionary t3 on t3.value = t.refund_state and t3.type = 'RefundStatus' left join sys_dictionary t4 on t.pay_type = t4.value and t4.type ='PayType' left join sys_dictionary t5 on t.card_type = t5.value and t5.type ='CardType' left join sys_dictionary t6 on t.flow_type = t6.value and t6.type='FlowType' -- left join sys_dictionary t7 on t.business_type = t7.value and t7.type='' left join sys_dictionary t8 on t.PAY_NOTIFY_STATE = t8.value and t8.type='PayNotifyState' left join sys_dictionary t9 on t.ORDER_NOTIFY_STATE = t9.value and t9.type='OrderNotifyState' left join DOWN_CHANNEL t10 on t.DOWN_CHANNEL_NO=t10.DOWN_CHANNEL_NO where {@t.OrderNo}

item.sql: select t.*, t1.name PayStatusLabel, t2.name OrderStatusLabel, t3.name RefundStatus, t4.name PayTypeName, t5.name CardTypeName, t6.name FlowTypeName, t8.name PayNotifyState, t9.name OrderNotifyState from (select RID from (select R.RID, rownum LineNum from (select t.rowid RID from order_main t where t.MANUAL_STATUS = 20 {&@t.OrderStatus} {&@t.PayStatus} {&@t.RefundState} {&@t.OrderNo} {&@t.PartnerOrderNo} {&@t.Face} {&@t.BusinessType} {&@t.PayType} {&@t.CreateTime >= to_date($ST,'yyyy-MM-dd')} {&@t.CreateTime < to_date($ET,'yyyy-MM-dd')+1} {& :Condition} order by t.create_time desc) R where rownum <= { :PS} * { :PI}) where LineNum > { :PS} * ({ :PI} - 1)) tab inner join order_main t on t.rowid = tab.RID left join sys_dictionary t1 on t1.value = t.pay_status and t1.type = 'PayStatus' left join sys_dictionary t2 on t2.value = t.order_status and t2.type = 'OrderStatus' left join sys_dictionary t3 on t3.value = t.refund_state and t3.type = 'RefundStatus' left join sys_dictionary t4 on t.pay_type = t4.value and t4.type ='PayType' left join sys_dictionary t5 on t.card_type = t5.value and t5.type ='CardType' left join sys_dictionary t6 on t.flow_type = t6.value and t6.type='FlowType' -- left join sys_dictionary t7 on t.business_type = t7.value and t7.type='' left join sys_dictionary t8 on t.PAY_NOTIFY_STATE = t8.value and t8.type='PayNotifyState' left join sys_dictionary t9 on t.ORDER_NOTIFY_STATE = t9.value and t9.type='OrderNotifyState' order by t.create_time desc

item.sql: select t.*, t1.name PayStatusLabel, t2.name OrderStatusLabel, t3.name RefundStatus, t4.name PayTypeName, t5.name CardTypeName, t6.name FlowTypeName, t8.name PayNotifyState, t9.name OrderNotifyState, dc.CHANNEL_NAME DChannelName from (select RID from (select R.RID, rownum LineNum from (select t.rowid RID from order_main t where {@t.OrderNo} {&@t.PartnerOrderNo} {& :Condition} order by t.create_time desc) R where rownum <= { :PS} * { :PI}) where LineNum > { :PS} * ({ :PI} - 1)) tab inner join order_main t on t.rowid = tab.RID left join sys_dictionary t1 on t1.value = t.pay_status and t1.type = 'PayStatus' left join sys_dictionary t2 on t2.value = t.order_status and t2.type = 'OrderStatus' left join sys_dictionary t3 on t3.value = t.refund_state and t3.type = 'RefundStatus' left join sys_dictionary t4 on t.pay_type = t4.value and t4.type ='PayType' left join sys_dictionary t5 on t.card_type = t5.value and t5.type ='CardType' left join sys_dictionary t6 on t.flow_type = t6.value and t6.type='FlowType' -- left join sys_dictionary t7 on t.business_type = t7.value and t7.type='' left join sys_dictionary t8 on t.PAY_NOTIFY_STATE = t8.value and t8.type='PayNotifyState' left join sys_dictionary t9 on t.ORDER_NOTIFY_STATE = t9.value and t9.type='OrderNotifyState' left join DOWN_CHANNEL dc on t.Down_Channel_No = dc.DOWN_CHANNEL_NO order by t.create_time desc
